minecraftxiv.midnightconfig.title: Minecraft XIV
minecraftxiv.midnightconfig.scrollWheelZ: Zoom with scroll wheel (override hotbar scrolling)
minecraftxiv.midnightconfig.capabilities: Additional capabilities that aren't vanilla server friendly. These must be enabled on the server.
minecraftxiv.midnightconfig.targetFromCa: Pick target from cursor position instead of player line of sight.
